item.title: Trump defeats Australia’s mad cow disease restrictions in deal to ship American beef overseas
item.description: The Trump's administration claimed it as a major victory over “non-scientific trade barriers.”

item.title: Intel plans to slash 25,000 jobs in 2025 as new CEO warns ‘there are no more blank checks’
item.description: CEO Lip-Bu Tan sent a memo informing employees of significant ongoing layoffs and cost-cutting.

item.title: America is starting to eat Trump’s tariffs TACO salad, UBS says
item.description: "It's quiet ... a little too quiet," writes Mark Haefele, chief invesmtent officer of UBS Global Wealth Management.
